Articles.Content:
Welcome to KTE, Kerbal Transportation Enterprises! For all your transportation needs! And coolness needs!

(This will become a company in rocket builders soon but for now this is just the showroom)

Here at KTE we take things into the kerbal universe! We started as a locomotive works for the KSC. As a reward for our one of a kind train services, they gave us knowledge for building many other craft. We specify in trains but work VERY well in everything else within Kerbin SOI and are developing interplanetary travel. What separates us from other companies is that we are developing Kerbin exploration ROVERS. Few in the Space Program community explore Kerbin via train.

This will be added to (duh).

United Company Of Locomotive Works

Formed up from previous locomotive manufacturers, we at the UCLW strive to bring trains back into the public eye.

The workhouse of the KSTP, Kerbal Space Train Program, the 4-8-8-4 Bigboy.

This gigantic locomotive used to only be in the Knion Kacific, But has been in everyone's mind. We bring it to space exploration for the rover "Saturn V" work.

The unsung heroes of the railways are shunters. Without them haveing trains would be hard. We revive them and they can be used as low gravity main line engines.

I present to you the E2!

This is all I could get from the auto save. I HAD SO MUCH!!!!! What happened was that I had to log in after I press post new, but then it didn't work. So I popped up a new window to check it. But it did not show up. When I saw this restore auto save I got excited but this is all. I WORKED MRE THAN 3 HOURS, Can this please be fixed? As in haveing to log in after typeing a huge thread and then it not posting. I SWEAR, IT AUTO SAVED MUCH MORE THAN ONCE.;.; Sorry for this in spacecraft exchange. It was SUPPOSED to be perfectly related but this happened so yeah.
